Package screen

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
screen.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameOverScreen, GameScreen, HighScoreScreen, ManualScreen, PauseScreen, ScoreScreen, SettingScreen, TitleScreen
public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
Implements a generic screen.

  • Field Summary

    protected DrawManager drawManager
    Draw Manager instance.

    Frames per second shown on the screen.

    Time until the screen accepts user input.

    Sound player in Screen.

    What kind of screen goes next.

      public Screen​(int width, int height, int fps)
      Constructor, establishes the properties of the screen.
      Parameters:
      width - Screen width.
      height - Screen height.
      fps - Frames per second, frame rate at which the game is run.
